Title: Miracle in Cell No. 7
Writer: Hwan-kyung Lee (screenplay), Yeong-ah Yoo (screenplay), Hwang-seong Kim (screenplay), Young-seok Kim (screenplay)
Actors: Seung-ryong Ryu, So Won Kal, Dal-su Oh, Man-sik Jeong
Plot: A story about love between a mentally-ill father and his lovingly adorable daughter. Accused of murder and rape, her father's home is prison.
